website_summaries.verdict: A best buy for younger babies that offers a good value for the cost.
pros: The Nuby spoons get top marks from customers because of their soft, gentle shape and decent size that holds a good amount of food
Users also like the safety feature that turns the spoon white when food is too hot
cons: Tends to stain, especially with darker baby foods

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Ive only used this item a couple of times so I cant say how it will stand up to wear, however I am extremly happy with the size and dexterity of it. I had ordered some spoons that were super flexible, and although soft on the gums, they were difficult to use. These fit my hand, and my babys mouth perfect. Edit: Ive used these spoons on both hot and cold items...and found that I CANNOT trust the color change. I dont know if it was affected by shipping (I live in a hot climate), however it is not nearly sensitive enough. Ive dropped my review to 4 stars. I still love the feel and size of the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda S Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nuby vs. Spuni
customer_reviews.text: I bought these spoons and the Spuni spoons when we started solid foods with my 4+ month old. I think the Spuni worked best for the first couple times as my baby was figuring it out but since then he seems to eat better with these Nuby spoons. These spoons also hold a lot of food and are soft. My baby loves to chew on them maybe too much. Agree with other reviews that they get discolored but it doesn't impact the functionality. Planning to buy more of these for my little guy who is 7 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stains easily
customer_reviews.text: Like others have commented, these stain terribly. This happened after the first use of each and the stain will not come out, so if you choose to get this be prepared for them to be permanently yellow-orange. Also, it takes a lot for the heat-activated color change to occur, so really can't rely on that either (I held it in hot water for several minutes and it barely gave any color change in that time. Aside from those things, it gets the food into my baby's mouth.... But that's all you can expect.
customer_reviews.author: TheMushroomMan

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. They seem to do a fine job of indicating when food is too hot, but they all stained. They also aren't my favorite shape of spoon since we also purchased the OXO Baby Spoons, which are more of a flat surface than a cupped surface and it is easier to get all of the food in her mouth with each bite with those. These seem to be more of a novelty than a practical solution to feedings, especially since it isn't that hard to test the food for temperature without them.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Ok spoons for eating, but easily stained
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they sure soft. Wish they were alittle bigger and deeper. Also, once you feed your baby anything that's yellow/orange, you'll never get the stain out of the spoon. They get easily stained and now they are permanently stained ( which I don't really care)
customer_reviews.author: daVi

customer_reviews.title: Plastic stains, but otherwise OK.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like clean stuff looking dirty, you may want to skip these. One feeding of carrots will leave your spoon completely orange. Let's not talk about beets. The stains don't release from the plastic even with an overnight peroxide soak. Bleach might work, but I'm not about to bleach something that goes in my baby's mouth. Also, the heat changing plastic is a gimmick. It requires significant heat to change color.
customer_reviews.author: Creepstar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daugher tends to be distracted and at times it makes it hard for her to sit still so that I can place the food in her mouth with no issue. This spoon allows me to not worry about the food falling off of the spoon. It allows me to place it in her mouth andnot have to do the up motion for her to get the food. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: goldy02

customer_reviews.title: Used with my dog
customer_reviews.text: I had a special needs dog that needed to eat upright and slowly. These worked perfectly for him. The material was soft enough not to hurt his teeth or gums but sturdy enough not to be ruined by those same teeth. They also went through the dishwasher well. I’m sure they’d work for babies, too, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Matney

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. Didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Ive had them for over 2months and they stain real easy and appear to be peeling at the ends. They feel as if a bit scrathy. Not a big fan of the shape of the spoon. I preferred the munchkin spoons. I had purchased those at the same time as the nuby. They have lasted way longer and are smoother at the spoon end.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pierren

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons Hold the perfect amount of food for my 8 month old baby Have been using for 2 months They turn white when baby's food is too hot Only complaint is these spoons and so many others stain so easy
customer_reviews.author: Dessy

customer_reviews.title: Spoons are very good but I gave a two star rating because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are very good but I gave a two star rating because the description of these spoons doesn't say that they can be permanently stains with carrot, pumpkin and other foods even though it doesn't alter its function nor hot indicator. For me, this is important to know because I don't like to see stained plastic because it gives a dirty look to the spoons even if they are clean. I wouldn't have purchased these spoons if I knew that. On the other hand, the spoon work great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good sized spoon for younger babies
customer_reviews.text: Great for smaller babies. These fit well in their mouth and have a sturdy spoon. Don’t love how the white part stains, would rather just have them all a different color. Also, it’s a bit of a pain that these are only top rack safe....I tried putting them on the shelf on the top but they were blown all around.
customer_reviews.author: Gibbogirl

customer_reviews.title: Spoons easily stains
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and fits my daughters mouth. Good for puree fruits and baby cereal. However, the spoons stained from sweet potatoes and carrots. The stain won't wash off. I never saw the color change on the spoon even when tested under hot running water.
customer_reviews.author: Platinum

customer_reviews.title: A must for baby
customer_reviews.text: I want to start out by I love Nuby products. I had gotten some of these at a consignment sale included in a dishwasher safe basket package. When we started solids with our little man at about 6 months old, these were perfect. Really nice long handle to reach into those taller baby food jars. Temp sensitive to help me feed my son in a safe manner. Small enough to fit into baby's mouth as well. Dishwasher safe, can be sterilized. At 17 months old we still use these for our little one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boldt

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are perfect for little ones that like to chew everything. Because of how soft the spoon is I don't have to worry about my baby biting down on it. The shape of the spoon allows you to easily feed baby without all the puree falling off as it does with some of the others spoons I've tried. The only thing I don't like is how easily the spoons stain. I have purchased another package of these spoons because I like them so much. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deejd1220

customer_reviews.title: These are a good choice
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cool. The colored portion in the bowl of the spoon will turn white if the food is too hot. Be careful because the white soft portion will stain if you don't wash them pretty quickly after using them. Both of my boys liked eating with these spoons. They contain a nice and small portion of food in the bowl and are easy for the baby to get in their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Neidert

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoon. Bought another set with my third child. Very convenient for temp check
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a week
customer_reviews.text: They were really difficult for my baby to eat. The shape was just not good. Then when you put them on the dishwasher they kept falling and sometimes it looked like the plastic was coming off. A mess. Don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Soft and small for baby but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I would like these spoons more if they were flatter, but they scoop down so much that it's hard for my daughter to get all of the food off the spoon with each bite. Also, not a big deal at all, but they will be permanently orange if you serve carrots or sweet potatoes with them. Also, packaging said they're only top rack dishwasher safe (which most plastics are) but since my silverware holder is on the bottom I have to wash by hand. Again, not a deal-breaker but there are spoons out there better suited to my preferences.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyEverythingonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great concept and shape but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and shape but poor execution. The heat safe feature doesn't work - I ran these under steaming hot water when I was originally washing them and only one spoon started to change white as described. After one use with only sweet potatoes, the spoon was stained. Attached images are clean/washed spoons after second use. Would not buy again and I will be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: KBrack

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it, stains easily
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The spoon shape is great. My son has no trouble eating from it. Cons- The heat sensing aspect of the spoon doesn't work in any of the spoons we received. I've held them under hot water while washing them and there was no color change. The spoons stain very easily. After feeding my son sweet potato the spoon is now permanently stained orange. I rinsed it after using it and washed it in the dishwasher and it's still orange. If you are more concerned about functionality than how it looks, it's a great spoon.
customer_reviews.author: KatieU

customer_reviews.title: Color changing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. They change to clear color when food is hot. But, unfortunately the food color stains wont come off. They are discolored with whatever color of food i feed my baby. But they are great and baby loves to try and chew it. It holds up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbummama

customer_reviews.title: Fake or just cheap?
customer_reviews.text: are these fakes or just bad quality? The hot and cold color changing is non existent.. The plastic is cheap and poorly constructed.. To be honest I’m a little nervous to use these for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size for beginner feeders
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for my son, he is just turning 6 months old and starting on cereal. We purchased 2 types of spoons and chose these to start with. The have a deep well in the spoon, which is nice for getting cereal onto the spoon, especially with the loose cereal you start feeding with. The spoon is soft, no hard edges, and the color changing does work (found this out the hard way, oops!). Word to the wise, they do not work well for Jello, as my smarty pants husband found out the hard way!
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfEthan

customer_reviews.title: Easily fit baby's small mouth
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm satisfied with the purchase though these spoons stain and the stains can't be washed no matter how hard you try. On the positive side, they are really soft and their shape and size are very comfortable for the baby's small mouth. I've tried a number of other spoons, but the baby definitely likes these ones more.
customer_reviews.author: Marine

customer_reviews.title: Product is a failure
customer_reviews.text: As a parent we anyway don’t have the patience and then a product so infuriating.. the food kept dripping off the spoon and the chin of the baby. It’s like feeding with a square block. Couldn’t even scoop off the food on the baby’s chin. It made my feeding experience outright exhausting and irritating
customer_reviews.author: Ajay J.

customer_reviews.title: I like the but they stain
customer_reviews.text: First time i used one of them i fed carrots to my baby and it stained the spoon orange. I didnt leave it in the sink or anything, i rinsed as soon as she was done eating and it was stained. otherwise functions accordingly
customer_reviews.author: Ashley wilson

customer_reviews.title: Only spoon my son will use
customer_reviews.text: So these are the only spoons my son will eat with. Other baby spoons we have tried are too wide, so it is hard to get the entire head of the spoon in baby's mouth. I also like that they have long handles. My son like to "help" me feed him. These handles are long enough that he and I can both hold on when putting the food in his mouth. I put them in the dishwasher on the bottom rack with the rest of the silverware, and have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: LG78

customer_reviews.title: Great except for stains
customer_reviews.text: I like the safety feature and they are a great texture for my teething 9mon old but the white portion stays extremely easy and is impossible to get back to white. It's a cosmetic issue but still annoying.
customer_reviews.author: WDG

customer_reviews.title: great for 1st time utensils
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old is starting to eat solid foods now so we bought these for her first baby utensils. I love them, they turn clear when the food it too hot and they stay the color of the spoon indicating the food is cold or warm. Of course if you're like me I try the food before giving it to our baby so I always know whether the food is right temp or not, or tastes good or doesn't for our little one. They are easy to clean.. We haven't had any problems with these.
customer_reviews.author: s_cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easily stains
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used one of these spoons I scrubbed it immediately afterwards but it still got stained. I wish the spoon were a bit softer too. Only the very tip is silicone but the rest of the spoon seems too ridgid to me. This may not be a big deal if your baby is a little older and you aren’t worried about bruising their gums.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: spoons for newborn
customer_reviews.text: These are for my newest grandchild and great grandson. Hope they work good...no ideas until birth.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are a great value. And I love how it shows if the food is too warm by just dipping it in the food. It's nice not dipping your finger in the food to test the temperature. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the spoons stain very badly. They literally absorb whatever you dip them into and it absorbs all the way up into the handle. So if that isn't going to bother you then it's a great, cheap spoon set!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect feeding size
customer_reviews.text: They’re wonderful would definitely recommend to all parents. If you feed spaghetti with red sauce it will dye white parts orange, that’s to be expected though
customer_reviews.author: Targaryen249

customer_reviews.title: My preferred baby spoon
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ergonomics of this spoon. It’s designed perfectly making it easier to feed baby. I also like that it’s rubbery because it feels nicer in baby’s mouth. It’s my preferred spoon for feeding my baby.
customer_reviews.author: yale

customer_reviews.title: Traps odor and holds color. Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much useless. It traps colors and odors. The only marginally useful feature is the temperature sensor. But that works only when the food is hot enough to fell by touch. Had to discard in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Yeswekay

customer_reviews.title: Okay... i like munchkin better
customer_reviews.text: Stains VERY easy. Baby at sweet potatoes and the spoons are stained orange. Nothing gets it out. Also the spoon angle has a dip and is hard to get all the food off in the mouth. At least for my 4 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: It sure was a great buy. Beautiful product, very high quality, we recommend 100%. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It sure was a great buy. Beautiful product, very high quality, we recommend 100%. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice for my 9 month baby. They are not too deep, so less mess. My husband really liked the color change option and puts them under hot water in the sink to demonstrate to family members lol. HOWEVER, please, please do NOT rely on the color change to indicate if the food is too hot. While it certainly does work, it takes about 30+ seconds to change color. In that time, you could have fed your little one a too-hot mouthful.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Color changing doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Spoon does not turn white unless it is in VERY hot liquid for many seconds (EG under a stream of hot water). Simply taking a spoonful of hot food won’t change the color.
customer_reviews.author: lenergyrlah

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: As described - but hard to clean food stains as mentioned by other reviewers. But I like that it changes colors to show high temperature. Overall happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, meh implementation
customer_reviews.text: Stained super easily! So now I'm afraid to use them with any food with color. We were able to get most of the staining out by letting them soak in bleach and baking soda, but that's a big hassle when you're a busy mama. Great idea though...
customer_reviews.author: Vanilly

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite spoons to use with my son. They are made at a great angle for feeding so that food doesn't spill off the end. I like to give my son the spoon to use so he is familiar with utensils even though he is still too young to properly use them, he mostly just chews on them because he is teething and with the soft edges on this spoon i don't worry that he will cut his gums. The only down side is that they stain easily but at this price can be easily replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Lmkane

customer_reviews.title: These are cute and functional but seem to stain pretty easy. I fed my diabetes some carrots
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and functional but seem to stain pretty easy. I fed my diabetes some carrots, rinsed the spoon directly after, but it was already stained. The color changing is a nice feature, but I’m not sure who should really need it
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons! I’ve actually bought 4 packs of these and ordered some more. Pro: Very durable. Easy on my baby’s gums. I love how you can just throw them in the dishwasher. The hot white feature is also very useful especially when we were just starting with solids Con: they stain orange with the sweet potato and carrot but doesn’t really bother me
customer_reviews.author: satz

customer_reviews.title: Heat changing feature does not work
customer_reviews.text: The heat sensor barely works. I have to run them under extremely hot water to get them to change color even the slightest. Beside that, they are typical baby spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel LJG

customer_reviews.title: Def recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I tried many brands of spoons for my baby n nothing’s as durable, soft n easy to use s as this. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but change color.
customer_reviews.text: Love the spoons, but agree with other reviewers that I wish they didn't turn orange from carrots/ sweet potatoes. One interesting thing, is that homemade sweet potatoes did not affect color, but sweet potatoes out of a jar did... Depth seems to be okay for introducing solids to 6 month old.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBearTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and color changing
customer_reviews.text: We have loved these spoons. My baby also uses them to teeth and play with. They change color if your baby food is too warm. They are easy to clean but be careful if you feed baby strawberry or anything red like spaghetti because it will stain!!
customer_reviews.author: JakeTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Easy for baby to use, I just don't like that the spoon is easily stained by the food. It makes me feel like there's no way to get it clean because the food has soaked into the plastic. I will be throwing these away after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great little spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The spoon tips are not too sharp so they soften the blow when my baby jams them into his face. The color changing is cool but not necessary. One star is removed for how porous these spoons are. I left the tip of a spoon in a bowl of yellow baby food and the spoon is completely dyed yellow. Looks pretty gross.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Better for babies 1 year plus
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to dishwasher and baby throwing around. Too large for smaller baby mouth. Better for babies over 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Too small- doesnt hold enough food
customer_reviews.text: I will not be using these as they ended up being too small. It doesnt hold enough food in as the actual spoon area is slim and smaller than what i was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: So.FL Mom

customer_reviews.title: While I like these spoons a lot because of the shape and ...
customer_reviews.text: While I like these spoons a lot because of the shape and soft texture, they have stained within the first use of a strong colored food, such as sweet potatoes. Would likely not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as an addon, and thus they were extremely cheap. they are a decent size, and lightweight. They do have a couple of flaws. Squash that was promptly washed off stained the first one, and each after has had similar results. I also did not see a color change when hot water was applied, like the description states. Will try something else in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zom

customer_reviews.title: Stains very easy and will NOT come off
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons I used them for my first child, and all of hers stained pretty badly. Now I have twins and I figured they would have figured out how to change that, but obviously not. The FIRST time I used the spoons they all stained... I feel like they aren’t clean bc if the stain and that’s just gross to me.. Other than that problem they are great spoons they fit in to my 4month old twins mouths great!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ice cream spoons!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are the best. (I don't have a kid, I just like little spoons!) They don't get too cold like metal spoons do when eating ice cream. I can see how they'd be perfect for kids, because I swear I could chomp on one of these as hard as I could and not hurt my teeth. My roommate is so jealous of these spoons - I have to keep her from filching them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K-D

customer_reviews.title: Best Spoons Ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these spoons. I'm a mother of five and these are the only spoons I use. The angle is perfect for feeding beginners. The soft edges are great for teething babies.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easily Stain
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard spoon. The dip in the spoon may be too deep for our 6 month old at the moment but she could easily grow into it. It's a shorter spoon so I think our kiddo will learn to hold it more easily than others but it does stain even after just the first use. We specifically fed her carrots to start off and the orange coloring will be forever there.
customer_reviews.author: Msollenb

customer_reviews.title: Good baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons. They're nice and soft- my baby loves to grab them while eating just to chew on the spoon itself. They hold a good amount of food and fit well into baby's mouth. As other reviewers pointed out, they do stain quite easy, but that isn't really that big of a deal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Stain Easily
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are the perfect size for baby. However, they stain very easily and the coloring from other foods does not come off. They look dirty even after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: MI Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Nuby spoons
customer_reviews.text: Good spoons they actually let you know when the baby food is too warm. They just stain from the baby food very easily. Other than that I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if wanting a temp control
customer_reviews.text: Used once with carrots and it stained them orange. Sweet potatoes and pumpkin also stained them, terrible quality, you can't tell when they turn 'white' anymore...
customer_reviews.author: gandj

customer_reviews.title: The only spoon my son will eat from.
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's favorite spoons. He cries if we use any other type of baby spoon. I like how easy they are to hold and that the rubber part around the edge of the spoon doesn't hurt his gums while teething. We don't really use the "hot safe" feature on these since I usually test the temperature of the food by touch. some change color when they get hot and some don't.
customer_reviews.author: Kmumbarger

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These aren't bad but they aren't great. The shape of the spoon is too deep for my 8 mo old to get the food into his mouth. Maybe they work for older kids. Also the temperature gauge that is supposed to turn white doesn't really work. I had to hold it under scalding water for nearly 2 minutes for it to turn...by then the food is cooled!
customer_reviews.author: Hopey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality small convenient spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spoons, the color changing part is very helpful, especially if you microwave the food beforehand. The spoons are small, great for babies with small mouths. I also own NUK spoons, and while they feel softer than these Nuby ones, they are often too wide. I usually find this to be my spoon of choice. Besides that, the value is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katya M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the baby spoons that are a bit more flattened ...
customer_reviews.text: The hot safety feature doesn't work. I haven't notice any color changing except some staining from yellow and red foods on the white plastic part. The shape of the spoons is extra scooped or deep and my baby doesn't get all of the food out of the spoon. I like the baby spoons that are a bit more flattened out and not as deep of a scoop so that my baby can get all of the bite each time. I wouldn't purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Good size for first solid foods
customer_reviews.text: We bought these after some other spoons turned out to be more toddler sized, not so good for 4 month old mouths. These spoons are a great shape, and the handle is easy for parents to maneuver food into wiggly baby's mouth. Like other reviewers noted, these stain super easily. I thought it was just if you put it in hot food, but no, the first time we used them to stir a bowl of room temperature sweet potato puree (homemade, if that makes a difference), the spoon got an orange tint on the white parts. And it stayed after washing. I don't care very much, the spoon still works. Just noting it really does stain easily.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K.

customer_reviews.title: good for hands, bad for mouths
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are easy for my daughter to hold, but the depth of the spoon was too much when she was just starting to take solids, so mostly we let her play with them to practice dexterity but didn't actually use them for eating. A shallower spoon is better for little mouths, especially when first introducing solids.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easily Stained
customer_reviews.text: These are great feeling and very user friendly. My son grips them great and they're not too deep so food doesn't over fill. But they stain so, so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: Helpful indicator when food is hot
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first solids for my babies. We tried it with warm rice cereal. It changes colors (the color becomes lighter) when the spoon touches warm food, but the color returns when the spoon is back to cold - which is helpful in knowing when the food is too hot. I would definitely recommend it for serving solids to the little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Nummy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and softness!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for two years. Using them with my own kids, as well as ones I babysit. They are the perfect size and softness.
customer_reviews.author: Addierm97

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment! Great product new mom I bought them for is going to love them!
customer_reviews.author: Great shirt

customer_reviews.title: Good, but a little too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: These do work well, but I feel they become white too easily. Like when the food is the right temperature and I take a bite before giving it to my daughter, the color has already changed on the spoon. Also the white edges have stained - not sure a if that's from what she's eaten (sweet potatoes, carrots, beets, peas, and other baby food purées) or from the dishwasher. It doesn't really bother me but might bother some people.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: These are good spoons and function as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are good spoons and function as expected. They will however stain from orange baby food, so don't be surprised when this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok but discolored
customer_reviews.text: I like the spoons but they do get dyed if you feed your child carrots or sweet potato. They will literally turn orange. Also the spoon itself is a bit deep so my baby can't always get everything out of the spoon. I would prefer something more shallow.
customer_reviews.author: MamadoesitbestTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These are good to feed 8month plus infants
customer_reviews.text: These are good to feed 8month plus infants. The scoop part is quite thick and it's good for feeding soups or purée with flowing consistency. As others have said they stain easily. you can get rid of the stain buy placing the spoon in direct sunlight for a day or two and they turn white as new.
customer_reviews.author: Hari

customer_reviews.title: Only drawback is how easily they stain
customer_reviews.text: I kove the softness of the spoons. Only drawback is how easily they stain. Color indication if when food is hot is kind of nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Not very soft but works good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the material might be not soft enough after I received them, as babies like to bite the spoon during feeding. It turns out that it’s ok, even it not soooo soft, it won’t hurt the baby. The spoon size is perfectly fit. I like them, despite that food with colors dyes them.
customer_reviews.author: cisbra

customer_reviews.title: Having troubles with the white part staining.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about these. The white part of the spoon stains and it doesn’t have a sharp enough edge to make scraping food off baby’s face easy. The rounded edge does make for a spoon that doubles as a chew toy though. If you have a kiddo who loves to chew on their spoon like mine does, it is nice for that reason. I just wish they didn’t stain.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Love! They do stain orange in no time (from ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! They do stain orange in no time (from sweet potato etc) but I love them enough not to care. Just enough flexibility to the spoon head for when my baby is being difficult and a good sized amound of food in each bite (unlike the munchkin brand which must only be for the likes of fictional characters!)
customer_reviews.author: Cherilee

customer_reviews.title: work great but takes a while to test temperature
customer_reviews.text: Spoons work well but the temperature sensitivity takes a while....you have to stir something for close to 30 seconds before the spoon tip will change color if it's too hot...that's just a long time to wait with a hungry baby. They do work though
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Grey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if not staining
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this item. It has the perfect size for my 5 months old son, however it just stained on my 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaflo

customer_reviews.title: Cute, safe, affordable
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute spoons. I love that they change color if the food is too hot for the baby. My 6 month old likes to eat from this spoon and chew on it herself. I marked it down a little because the white edges have been stained by sweet potato.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Would repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very soft yet firm. Love the colors. Clean off perfectly. Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.author: BeesMom

customer_reviews.title: ok baby spoon
customer_reviews.text: baby jars stain the plastic of this spoon it is not possible to wash it off the discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: mh811

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite spoons
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (8 months now) used it for 3 months now. I thought that they might be too tough, but she loves them, and the spoons are deep enough for watery baby food. Other spoons I bought were too shallow. I also like it because if the food is too hot, the color fades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great soft spoon and work well even after dishwasher cleaning
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and even after countless trips through the dishwasher (in the silverware basket, no less) they still change color. They are stained from various foods but they work.
customer_reviews.author: MyOwnSatelliteTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: They are Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. The color change is definitely hard to see and they stained badly just like the other reviewers mentioned. I mostly used them with cold foods so It didnt really matter. The spoon itself is small, good for babies starting solids.
customer_reviews.author: Irishrachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Brand Co.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brand. Great company! We buy most of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: great shape without the severe edges that trap the
customer_reviews.text: almost replaced all of my baby spoons when I got these, great shape without the severe edges that trap the food
customer_reviews.author: Issac

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these spoons!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these spoons! They are shaped perfectly for baby and your hand.
customer_reviews.author: A1D2

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Dummy proof your warm foods. if it turns white, don't put the food in your baby's mouth! My husband thought he broke them because he put them through the dishwasher and they came out wihtout color.. i had to remind him that this is what happens on purpose because the dishwasher was HOT. :)
customer_reviews.author: JackaRoni

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these but....
customer_reviews.text: After only two feedings, the white part of the spoon where it meets the food became stained and changed color. All four spoons are now stained in less than a month of use. I had to throw them out because they looked gross.
customer_reviews.author: Ugomma Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great first spoon
customer_reviews.text: Great first baby spoons. Soft silicone edges make it safe for baby's gums. The color does turn translucent white when hot but it's not a very accurate way of measuring food temp. Still need to try the food before giving to baby to make sure it's the right temp.
customer_reviews.author: DHJ

customer_reviews.title: Stained after First Use
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the other reviews and paid attention to the pictures. The white edges of these spoons stained after one use- even with washing as soon as finished feeding. Even with the stains, it still functions. I would recommend these spoons instead
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great little spoons. Worked out great as a gift after a baby shower game.
customer_reviews.author: Gammie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby spoons
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these spoons for our 9 month old for the last three months. They are so soft and hold the perfect amount of food for a baby's mouth. I think that the color indicator is very helpful- if the food is too hot, the colored part of the spoon becomes light or even white. If the color doesn't change, the temperature of the food is okay, and that's all the temperature sensitivity I've ever needed. The spoons do stain with orange food, but I've never been concerned with this- they just seem so much softer than stainless steel spoons that I don't think that a little discoloration matters.
customer_reviews.author: adwoa74

customer_reviews.title: Love these spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Good size for baby's mouth, long handle to hold. Easy to clean, but top rack only. Love the white hot feature.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Stain easily but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: My only con is that they stain. But other than that they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: J.W

product_meta.title: Nuby 4-Pack Hot Safe Feeding Spoons
product_meta.description:
Size:4M+These soft tip, Hot Safe Spoons are soft on tender gums and changes color when baby's food is too hot. The long handle is comfortable for mom to hold during feeding and is perfect for taller baby jars.Brand: NubyColors: Blue/pink/orange/greenLong handle designEach spoon has heat indicator, which determines if food is the right temperature for childChanges color when food is too hot, (approximately 110-degrees Fahrenheit/43-dgrees Celsius or above)BPA-FreeIncludes: 4-piece spoon setCare instructions: Dishwasher safeMaterials: PlasticDimensions: 8.8 inches long x 3.9 inches wide x 2 inches high

BRAND STORY
By Nuby
feature_bullets: Patented SOFT edge protects baby's teeth and gums
Spoon tip changes color if food is too hot for baby
Long, Easy Grip handle is designed to make it easy to reach the bottom of tall baby food jars
Gentle curve in the tip of the spoon makes it easier for baby to get contents off spoon
